name: Red a Arara
description:
[TEXT IN ENGLISH]

Red a Arara is a side scrolling platform game with camera that shows the side of the game, in which Red, the protagonist, must search for the lost family and save them from the illegal sale of wild birds in the Amazon rainforest.

[TEXTO EM PORTUGUÊS-BR]

Red a Arara é um jogo de plataforma side scrolling com câmera que mostra a lateral do jogo, em que Red o protagonista, deve procurar pela família perdida e salvá-los da venda ilegal de aves silvestres na floresta amazônica.

Members:

Kaio Gomes: game designer, 2D artist, game writer.

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kaio-g-816253116/

Vitor Neves: programmer, documentation reviewer, producer.

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/vitorneves0/

Jonathans Ferreira: musical composer.

Business Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/johnfauzi_music/
